title: Textile, "Canavera-Transparent", 1989
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: alternating stripes of sheer and dense plain weave
inscribed: along left edge; 7 registration circles, arrow, "DESIN CANAVERA-TRANSPARENT EXCLUSIV WK WOHNEN DESIGN SUSANNE LIND " along right edge registration circles.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 406 x 147.5 cm (13 ft. 3 13/16 in. x 58 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 407.5 x 147.5 cm (13 ft. 4 7/16 in. x 58 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 408 x 147.5 cm (13 ft. 4 5/8 in. x 58 1/16 in.)
Repeat H: 90 cm (35 7/16 in.)
description: Intersecting and overlapping geometric shapes. a, predominantly blue and peach. b,pastels,predominantly beige. c, predominantly yellow. all in 7 colors.
